Package eu.h2020.helios_social.module.socialgraphmining

Class SocialGraphMiner

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.h2020.helios_social.module.socialgraphmining.SocialGraphMiner
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GNNMiner
    public abstract class SocialGraphMiner
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides an abstraction of the basic capabilities and requirements of mining module algorithms.
    Author:
    Emmanouil Krasanakis

      • newInteraction

        public abstract void newInteraction​(eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.Interaction interaction,
                                    java.lang.String neighborModelParameters,
                                    boolean isReply)
        Makes the graph miner aware that a user received an interaction from another user with getModelParameters(eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.Interaction).
        Parameters:
        interaction - A new interaction the user initiates expressed in terms of the contextual ego network
        neighborModelParameters - The neighbor parameters to
        isReply - Whether the interaction is a "message received" acknowledgement. Typically, this would be false.

      • getModelParameters

        public abstract java.lang.String getModelParameters​(eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.Interaction interaction)
        Retrieves the parameters of the mining model that will be sent alongside the created interaction.
        Parameters:
        interaction - The new interaction the user receives expressed in terms of the contextual ego network
        Returns:
        A String serialization of model parameters.

      • evaluate

        public abstract java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> evaluate​(eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.Interaction interaction)
        Provides various measures concerning the efficacy of predicting the given interaction using the predictOutgoingInteractions() method. Needs be called before this interaction is registered (e.g. with newInteraction(eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.Interaction). Some of these measures assume binary (0/1) values and need be averaged across many interactions to provide meaningful insights.
        Parameters:
        interaction - The interaction to evaluate, expressed in terms of the contextual ego network
        Returns:
        A hashmap between measures and values.
